code: import{useMemo,useContext}from'react';import DashboardContext from'../contexts/generalContext';export default function useNewReleases(){const[state]=useContext(DashboardContext);const{artistData}=state;const artistDataChart=useMemo(()=>({title:{text:artistData===null||artistData===void 0?void 0:artistData.name},tooltip:{},legend:{data:['Datos del Artista']},xAxis:{data:['Seguidores','Popularidad']},yAxis:{},series:{type:'bar',data:[artistData===null||artistData===void 0?void 0:artistData.followers,artistData===null||artistData===void 0?void 0:artistData.popularity]}}),[artistData]);const radarChartData=useMemo(()=>{var _artistData$genres;return{title:{text:'Generos',x:'center'},tooltip:{},legend:{orient:'vertical',left:'left',data:artistData===null||artistData===void 0?void 0:artistData.genres},series:[{name:'',type:'pie',radius:'55%',center:['50%','60%'],data:artistData===null||artistData===void 0?void 0:(_artistData$genres=artistData.genres)===null||_artistData$genres===void 0?void 0:_artistData$genres.map(genre=>{const value=100/(artistData===null||artistData===void 0?void 0:artistData.genres.length);return{value,name:genre};}),itemStyle:{emphasis:{shadowBlur:10,shadowOffsetX:0,shadowColor:'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'}}}]};},[artistData]);return{artistDataChart,artistData,radarChartData};}
